text: Kya tumko khabar nahin hai ke zameen aur aasmano ki har cheez ka Allah ko ilm hai? Kabhi aisa nahin hota ke teen aadmiyon mein koi sargoshi(whispering) ho aur unke darmiyan chautha (fourth) Allah na ho, ya paanch aadmiyon mein sargoshi ho aur unke andar chatta (sixth) Allah na ho, khufiya baat karne wala khwa issey kam ho ya zyada jahan kahin bhi woh ho, Allah unke saath hota hai. Phir qayamat ke roz woh unko bata dega ke unhon ne kya kuch kiya hai. Allah har cheez ka ilm rakhta hai
